item.title: How do i change exp rate on satans isle
item.dc:creator: @fishypoo101 fishypoo101
item.description:
@fishypoo101 wrote:

addSkillXP((65*playerLevel[0]), 0); you change teh 65 to what ever you want.

item.title: How do i change exp rate on satans isle
item.dc:creator: @jat1801 jat1801
item.description:
@jat1801 wrote:

case 2873:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You train Attack !”);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(2068);
addSkillXP((65*playerLevel[0]), 0);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break
what i edit

item.title: How do i change exp rate on satans isle
item.dc:creator: @IP1 IP
item.description:
@IP1 wrote:

Ok, you now when you attack the dummy for attack? well it should say sometihng like “you attack the dummy” well whatever it says for your server search for that (then there should be some xp things and change that to whatever you want)

do this for every thing you want changed,

Thanks,
Hope i Helped
